entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
